website_summaries.verdict: Nice price per sheet for lint roller sheets that have more adhesive than average.
pros: If you have a pet with fur that's difficult to pick up, the extra adhesive on these sheets works well
Handle has a curve that will fit your hand perfectly
Even with extra adhesive, the roller doesn't leave residue on fabrics
cons: Can be difficult to separate the sheets after using one

customer_reviews.title: No better than the original - save your money
customer_reviews.text: These work well, but no better than the regular lint rollers by the same brand. We have pets and therefore buy a lot of lint rollers. We always buy this brand. When I saw the stickier version, I thought it would be perfect, but you really don't get your money's worth. I will continue to buy this brand as it is really good, but not the "stickier" version.
customer_reviews.author: JnJMomandDad

customer_reviews.title: Stick with the regular version!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this 50% stickier version of Scotch-Brite's lint rollers. I use them almost exclusively for pet hair. I swear they don't seem to pick up as well as the regular version. The used sheets are hard to tear off. Plus, the sheets have a sheerness to them--they are not as heavy duty as the regular version. No need to improve perfection Scotch-Brite. This "stickier" version is a fail as far as this consumer is concerned.I just reordered the regular version.
customer_reviews.author: Loscorvette

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I have bought the "Stickier Lint Rollers" many times and was happy enough to buy them again. But these last ones which I ordered by clicking on the "Buy Again" on the order page are completely different. They are almost translucent in appearance and they did not work as well as the regular lint rollers that have twice as many sheets. Its not worth my time to try and figure out why I received the unsatisfactory bundle of 6 rollers. I buy lint rollers a couple times a month. Until some explanation is on the product page I'll stick with the regular bundles of 6 which work better and have twice as many sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Picks up cat litter and hair like magic!
customer_reviews.text: I have two kittens six months old, and they are all over the place. Tracking litter, and leaving fur, so I had to find a lint roller that could handle what they leave behind. THIS is the one, folks! Every morning when I make my bed, I use the lint roller over the top and pick up all sorts of cat hair, and bits of litter and dirt, that you can't see, but its there. I keep on in the bedroom for the bed, and another in the living room for the furniture. It works wonderfully. It picks up cat litter with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Deb KayeTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Animal Hair and Lint Pickup
customer_reviews.text: I have used many brands,and types of lint rollers. This Scotch Brite is suppose to be 50% more sticky. I do not see any difference, unless gauging 50% more as not much difference.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: The best lint rollers
customer_reviews.text: With six cats and four dogs, I go through a LOT of lint rollers. I keep them in my house, my car, and at work. These are HANDS DOWN the best lint rollers I have found. I have been using these for the last few years. They work so well. Other lint rollers take more swipes and sheets than these do. They are worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE. SAVE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: VERY HARD TO REMOVE SHEETS TO GET A NEW STICKY PART. THE SAME ONES WITH THE BLACK HANDLE IS SO MUCH BETTER.
customer_reviews.author: DA BEAR

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye cat fuzz!
customer_reviews.text: I use the sticky roller to groom my cat who hates being groomed with a comb or brush. She likes the roller going over her back and sides. The sticky roller does a great job picking up cat fuzz from the furniture. Also, I use the sticky roller to pick up stray hair on the back of my blouse, sweaters after combing my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lint rollers. I’ve tried literally every brand available. These rank top 3 for me. I love that I was able to buy them in bulk because I am obsessive about removing lint from everything haha. Overall, very satisfied. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: KAYLI

customer_reviews.title: Buy something other than this
customer_reviews.text: They work good for removing lint and cat hair, but they also do not stick together, they roll off each other if your nor careful using
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for shedding dogs!!!
customer_reviews.text: I live with multiple dogs and also dog sit and walk. Having this on hand is extremely helpful. I also keep one by my door to use when I leave/ get home
customer_reviews.author: Christina Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Little manufacturing defect is annoying to me
customer_reviews.text: I set down my lint rollers with the tape roll like a column and the handle facing up. The tops of these rollers have a bubble in the plastic (which seems to be unintentional) so they are unstable when you set them down.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: Not to sticky.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t pick up dog hair very well. Hard to tear off. It works just like the regular ones.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Parra

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Always my favorite lint roller! We have 2 dogs and 3 kids...def a must in the house, car and at work!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Not good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product said extra strength, was not any better then the stuff you get at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: samuel mckinney

customer_reviews.title: CANT PEEL LAYERS
customer_reviews.text: It's near impossible to find the edges to peel off to next layer. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: jzloret

customer_reviews.title: very pricey sticky rollers
customer_reviews.text: regular sticky rollers, work as expected. quite small rolls though and very expensive for what you get
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: This was very disappointing, are usually use Gain rollers ...
customer_reviews.text: This was very disappointing, are usually use Gain rollers, however I wanted to try these and they are not worth what I paid. They barely stick to anything.
customer_reviews.author: Bs

customer_reviews.title: These have probably been one of the better rollers I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: These have probably been one of the better rollers I have purchased. They're extra sticky and work great on white boxer hairs. The only problem with them is you have to start a new paper more often as everything sticks to it (lint , dust).
customer_reviews.author: chipd801

customer_reviews.title: Good Bye cat hair!
customer_reviews.text: I wondered if they would be too sticky. Nope! They are much better/easier to use and there is no residue on my clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kasha

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't see that these pick up more lint even though they are tackier than the regular lint rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These didn't work any different than normal lint rollers. ...
customer_reviews.text: These didn't work any different than normal lint rollers. Isn't worth it for the price increase from any regular lint roller.
customer_reviews.author: AJ250

customer_reviews.title: Stickier than most
customer_reviews.text: They pick up more embedded pet hairs than most. Easy to change to a new sheet. Less frustrating than most.
customer_reviews.author: Robin F.

customer_reviews.title: Most expensive lint rollers
customer_reviews.text: Don't feel like they're worth the additional cost as they only satisfactorily remove lint.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Goodman

customer_reviews.title: MUCH BETTER THAN THEIR REGULAR LINT ROLLERS
customer_reviews.text: I USE THEM FOR LINT REMOVAL AND TO REMOVE DUST FROM LAMPSHADES
customer_reviews.author: L. Piero

customer_reviews.title: It works great and much better than the other lint rollers
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 dogs and this product is a lifesaver. It works great and much better than the other lint rollers. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Not that sticky
customer_reviews.text: If this was 50% stickier then the regular must be wax paper
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Read my post
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a super sticky product but it's really not. The individual tear off pieces are stronger than some other brands but this really doesn't pick up all of the cat hair I hoped it would. I used it on my comforter and went over the area about 4 times, where kitty snuggles up with us. I then used the cheap roller from Ikea and went over the same area and that one picked up tons more hair. So I guess I'll use both of them. I did learn a trick....try spraying the hairy area with the anti-cling spray, let it dry a few minutes and then use the rollers....best trick ever!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryllynn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love the regular Scotch-Brite lint rollers that I purchase all the time. I have 2 long haired cats so I use the regular grade all the time. I saw these and thought they might work better to pick up the fur so I gave them a try. I will say they do a good job but I don’t see any difference between the 2 so I am going to stick with the originals. It is much cheaper and you receive way more lint sheets. I was disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Shana Cowhig

customer_reviews.title: Better than most lint tape.
customer_reviews.text: This roller tape is super-sticky, but also fairly easy to tear-off the roll. A lot of other lint tapes are impossible to rip off the roll and find the edge again, but not with this roll (always easy to find the edge of the next tape). I also find the tape works on damp fabric as well as dry (using the tape on hand-washed items before hanging-up).
customer_reviews.author: Louise Garcia

customer_reviews.title: These rollers are amazing. A bit pricey but they're way stickier than ...
customer_reviews.text: These rollers are amazing. A bit pricey but they're way stickier than the standard rollers and extremely good at pulling pet hairs out of clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for those little hairs
customer_reviews.text: So perfectly sticky, nice thick sheets. Clung all the tiny animal fur and the sheets rip clean. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Hairless
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well. I have 5 cats & a dog & lots of hair. It’s nice to run this over my clothing & it is hairless
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Works exceptionally well on pet hair
customer_reviews.text: These rollers are super sticky they work extremely well highly recommended. I keep one in my car and pretty much in every room of my house
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Work well and great price for how many you get
customer_reviews.author: Leslie H.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This lint roller did not pick up lint very well. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Chesrow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THEY WORK VERY STICKY SO IT PICKS UP EVERYTHING LINT ETC BUY IT
customer_reviews.author: Maria CP

customer_reviews.title: not as good as previous 3M Fur Fighters
customer_reviews.text: not as good as previous 3M Fur Fighters, but will have to do since the others are no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: kay johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best lint rollers available, for anyone with a terrier in their life these RELLY work
customer_reviews.author: Zeezmum

product_meta.title: Scotch-Brite 50% Stickier Lint Roller, 6 Rollers, 48 Sheets per Roller, 288 Sheets Total, Works Great On Pet Hair
product_meta.description: When life gets messy, rely on the Scotch-Brite 50% Stickier Lint Roller to pick up the pieces. Whether you just devoured a lemon poppy-seed muffin or you took a tumble in your Chow Chow's dog bed, this lint roller is 50% stickier than Standard Scotch-Brite Lint Rollers. The rolling surface means you can make quick touchups on the fly, and the ergonomic handle feels comfortable in your hand as you roll away the mess. Go ahead and eat those cheesy cheese puffs or wrestle with your furry friend–then roll away the evidence with the Scotch-Brite 50% Stickier Lint Roller.
feature_bullets: 50% Stickier* roller for pickup beyond Lint and Hair
Great for large debris pick-up including leaves, coins, sand, crumbs, and salt
Handle ergonomically designed to fit comfortably in your hand
Tears cleanly down to the last sheet
Great for use on clothing, furniture and more
*Compared to standard Scotch-Brite Lint Rollers based on laboratory testing on fabric
